title: U.S. DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE
ingredients: 1/4 cup mild chiles, canned and diced
2 cups pinto or garbanzo beans, canned or cooked and drained
directions: Wash hands with soap and water.
Place chicken pieces in a large saucepan and add enough water to cover. https://www.myplate.gov/recipes/chicken-soup-chiles 1/5
